dialogue: Well, now that the celebrations are over...
It's time for your first job.
Great, what do I have to do?
We got word from an informant  about an Empire attack
on one of our bases on Planet Molotov.
have made it through to them as of yet.
I want you to head out there and let them know.
The sooner you can get there, the better.
We don't know when those Empire scum will attack.
Got it. I'll head out then.
